entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
